attributes.action: alter the e-petition system as to give an option to vote against a proposed petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, it is only possible to sign a petition in favour of it. I propose an option of signing against it to give a fair choice.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
